Hamdy Fathy Abdelhalim Abdelfattah is an Egyptian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Egyptian Premier League club Al Ahly and Egyptian national team. On 14 October 2019, Fathy made his international debut and scored the only goal in a 1–0 win against Botswana
